I actually have a lot of fun solving these different puzzles throughout the campaign.

Mi juego de puzzle por excelencia y de mis juegos favoritos de la vida, prácticamente todo los aspectos los ejecutaron de manera excelente, mejorando el de por sí ya fantástico Portal. Si quieres una buena historia con personajes memorables, humor, mecánicas excelentes, buenos gráficos, niveles bien trabajados, gran soundtrack y ambiente no deberías dudar para nada en comprarlo. Si no has jugado el primero, compra el pack que tiene los dos y verás la obra de arte que te estabas perdiendo. JUEGARDOS.
space space gotta go to space SPAAACEEE
A funny, fun, and challenging three dimensional puzzle game.
Muito bom recomendo mt o jg é mt bem feito e estou mt ancioso para o 3

Though the concept and plot may be a bit tough to understand, Portal 1 and its great sequel are great puzzle games that are basically a Must-Have on all steam accounts. With multiple mods and enhancers, the Portal series makes great time for puzzle fans, its not too hard nor too easy!
make sure to use your brain

I'll try to keep this paragraph short:

I've played this a time or three on my ol' 360.

It's a class SS sequel to a class S game.

Graphics: Great
Gameplay: Great
Difficulty: Moderate
Story: Great
Length: Great
Replayability: Moderate to Great depending on your likings.
Price: $9.99 are you kidding me BUY THIS NOW. 
Overall: Great


User created maps are available, co op is available, and completely separate from the single player campaign.


I think the cake.. was the portals we made along the way.

Portal 2 has enough positive reviews, you don't need to hear it from me too. But here I am anyways! The storyline and graphics are way better than Portal 1. There's a bunch of fun little things the devs put in like being able to steal office chairs or yeet turrets over balconies. The experience is just fun and whimsical.
Best game of all time thank you portal 2 for my life
Great game a must have but when I was trying out my Test: Half-Life Off Grid chapter 8 i got soft-locked where it was the title but no play game or anything.
It's a fun puzzle game with a good story
it makes ur brain fry but also fun

For 8€ a game like that is a stealer, if you put this in comparison to newer story based games like zelda which cost 60€ you becin to realize that the newer a game is the more chance thet the people dont care about you, rather about the money, in the caso of portal 2, that rule doesnt imply simply because its new and thats good, but even if it were to be just released it would probably be worth so much more!

My pick for best game of all time. The puzzles, the characters, the lore, the mechanics... everything about this game borders perfection. It took everything great about the already impressive Portal 1 and upped it to 10. No matter what type of games you play, do not miss out on Portal 2.
speedy ting go though, speedy ting come out. COMPANION CUBE NOOO. WHEATLY U ASS. U TO GLADOS
Good Game, not bad valvе, not bad
Awesome, atmospheric, makes you think but in a fun way.

Sans doute l'un de mes jeux préféré !
Un excellent puzzle game et une très bonne suite de l'original.

Le mode deux joueurs peut être une avanture co-op tout comme un festival de farce et attrapes avec votre coéquipier de test. 

De plus, avoir la possibilité de créer des niveaux pour la communauté est un excellent outils pour s'essayer au level design.
personaggi ottimi,meccaniche fantastiche e grafica invecchiata molto bene
Игра офигенная! Развивает извилины которых и так нет)) Крч игра хорошая, Вальве, спс за игру)))

[h1]Он не обычный дурак. Он — продукт величайших умов целого поколения, старавшихся создать наиглупейшего дурака в мире. А ты поставила его управлять этим комплексом.[/h1]

[i]Достойное продолжение первой части, которое углубило игру, дав ей историю и дополнительные геймплейные возможности.
Для своего времени эта игра очень хороша, да и сейчас она не теряет актуальности.
Отличная физика, саркастичные реплики GLaDOS - всё на высоте, впрочем, как и сам сюжет.
Именно здесь обретает смысл поговорка: "Враг моего врага - мой друг". 
Игра затягивает так, что после прохождения не верится, что больше не встретишь этих персонажей. [/i]

[u]Определённо, 10 тестовых камер из 10.[/u]
Sehr gutes Spiel. Ich habe es sehr gerne gespielt und es lief auch super. Ich finde das Spielprinzip einfach mega.
Excelente continuación , mas extenso y con puzzles mucho mas complicados , mas de lo que espera, genial para romperse la cabeza
